participant_1.background:
I am proud of my brother for achieving his dream of playing football in the NFL.
i am writing my first novel and hope to finish before the end of the year.
I want to learn Swedish so I can be more comfortable in Sweden.
I enjoy hiking because it allows me to connect with nature and my spiritual side.
i study philosophy at umass.

participant_2.background:
I drive a Subaru Outback because it's a practical car for getting to the lake and for carrying all my books.
I love the peace and quiet of the suburbs, and I enjoy the fact that I can walk my dogs in the park without having to worry about traffic.
i go to a catholic high school in new england.
My favorite people are those who share my love of game shows and fashion.
I was able to take a year off to pursue my music career.

content.text: Good. How are you doing today?
I'm doing well. I'm writing my first novel and I'm excited to finish it before the end of the year.
It's about a young woman who leaves her small town to pursue her dream of becoming a writer.
That sounds really interesting. I hope you publish it!
Thanks! Me too. I love to write and I'm excited to share my work with the world.
I'm sure it will be a success. What genre is it?
Cool. I love contemporary fiction. I'm reading one right now about a woman who goes on a road trip with her dog.
That sounds like a fun read. I'm a big fan of road trips.
Me too. They're a great way to see new places and meet new people.
I agree. I've been on a few road trips and they've always been memorable experiences.
Yeah, they're one of the best ways to travel
